short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi-Chain Support for BTC, ETH, BNB, SOL & MATIC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ArtChive wallet is a digital wallet that has the capability to incorporate various addresses across a range of blockchains, such as Solana and Ethereum. With this Multi-Chain wallet, you can easily store, send, and receive various coins/tokens from different blockchains using a single wallet and a single Passphrase. This extension is also available on MOZILLA ADD-ONS. https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/artchive-wallet/
